com.cube.storm.content.lib.manager

Class UpdateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.content.lib.manager.UpdateManager

  • public abstract class UpdateManager
extends Object
    This is the manager class responsible for checking for and downloading updates from the server

    Access this class via ContentSettings.getUpdateManager(). Do not instantiate this class directly

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpdateManager() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkForBundle()
      Downloads the latest full bundle from the server
      void checkForUpdates(long lastUpdate)
      Checks for updates on the server and downloads any new files in the form of a delta bundle
      void downloadUpdates(String endpoint)
      Downloads a tar.gz file from the given endpoint
      void integrityCheck(File contentPath)
      Checks the integrity of each file currently stored in cache

      This method compares the file hash with the hash in the manifest.
      void removeFiles(String folderPath, String[] fileList)
      Purges files in a folder that do not exist in the manifest

        public UpdateManager()

    • Method Detail

      • checkForBundle

        public void checkForBundle()
        Downloads the latest full bundle from the server

      • checkForUpdates

        public void checkForUpdates(long lastUpdate)
        Checks for updates on the server and downloads any new files in the form of a delta bundle
        Parameters:
        lastUpdate - The time of the last update. Usually found in the manifest.json file

      • downloadUpdates

        public void downloadUpdates(String endpoint)
        Downloads a tar.gz file from the given endpoint
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The endpoint to the tar.gz bundle/delta file

      • removeFiles

        public void removeFiles(String folderPath,
               String[] fileList)
        Purges files in a folder that do not exist in the manifest
        Parameters:
        folderPath - The folder to check, can be either, Constants.FOLDER_PAGES, Constants.FOLDER_LANGUAGES, Constants.FOLDER_CONTENT, or Constants.FOLDER_DATA
        fileList - The list of files to delete

      • integrityCheck

        public void integrityCheck(File contentPath)
        Checks the integrity of each file currently stored in cache

        This method compares the file hash with the hash in the manifest. If the hashes do not match, the file is discarded.
